data.title: Wedding Anniversaries on May 29
data.meta_description: Famous wedding anniversaries and divorces for the 29th of May. See which famous celebrities and historical figures got married and divorced on May 29.
data.text:
Famous Weddings

William I, Count of Nassau-Dillenburg weds Countess Walburga of Egmont

French nobleman and future Governor of Arcadia Pierre Dugua de Monts marries Judith Chesnel

Louis Pasteur

Bacteriologist Louis Pasteur (26) weds secretary Marie Laurent (23) in Strasbourg, France

Oscar Wilde

Irish writer Oscar Wilde marries Constance Lloyd at St. James Church, Paddington, London

Menachem Begin

Israeli Prime Minister Menachem Begin (25) weds Aliza Arnold

Sugar Ray Robinson

Boxing champion Sugar Ray Robinson (23) weds Edna Mae Holly

Anwar Sadat

Future President of Egypt Anwar Sadat (30) weds second wife, future human rights activist Jehan Raouf (15) in Egypt, entil his death in

Ben Bernanke

Federal Reserve Chairman Ben Bernanke (24) weds school teacher Anna Friedmann

Robert Downey Jr

American "Chaplin" and "Iron Man" actor Robert Downey Jr (27) weds American actress and singer Deborah Falconer (26); divorce in 2004

"Party of Five" actor Scott Wolf (35) weds "Real World" cast member Kelley Limp at St. Paul's Episcopal Church in Fayetteville, Arkansas

"America's Next Top Model" first winner Adrianne Curry (23) weds "The Brady Bunch" actor Christopher Knight (48) in Joliet, Illinois; divorce in 2012

Tom Ellis

Award-winning English actress Tamzin Outhwaite (35) weds former "EastEnders" actor Tom Ellis (27) at All Saints Church in Lullington, Somerset ; divorce in 2014

"Survivor: Fiji" winner Earl Cole (39) weds pharmacist Shelley Lee at the St. Regis Princeville Resort on Kauai

American "That '70s Show" actor Topher Grace (37) weds American actress and model Ashley Hinshaw (27) in Santa Barbara, California

Boris Johnson

British Prime Minister Boris Johnson (56) marries third wife Carrie Symonds (33) at Westminster Cathedral, London

Famous Divorces

Hank Williams

Country music legend Hank Williams and Audrey Sheppard granted divorce for the second and final time after seven years of marriage. Their first divorce was in 1948.

Shania Twain

Five-time Grammy Award singer Shania Twain (42) divorces music producer Robert John Lange (59) after 14 years of marriage
